data.text: @RepJoeNeguse @USPS @POTUS That's what the fuck your doing? Useless trash https://t.co/8jMDASygnB

@RepJoeNeguse @USPS @POTUS Is Biden paying for these tests out of his own pocket? Or even from the 10% cut that "The Big Guy" gets on foreign contracts?

Otherwise, Lying Joe, please properly refer to these as "American Tax Payer Furnished" in home COVID-19 tests, so as not to mislead the American people.

@RepJoeNeguse @USPS @POTUS When is the vote on the USPS noms to be on the board and remove #Dejoy before generals?  What is going on with that?  Why can't the Dem base get a monthy press briefing on agendas from the House and Senate.  It's like yelling into the void.  @SenSchumer taking every single recess
@RepJoeNeguse @USPS @POTUS Why is  DeJoy not fired yet? WHY ???

@RepJoeNeguse @USPS @POTUS Can you also tell them that to speed up the delivery? I ordered them and they were returned "as wrong address" even though my order used my auto-fill for my shipping address. I re-ordered them, took over 3 wks. That timing makes the tests irrelevant.
@RepJoeNeguse @USPS @POTUS I like how you work hard for your constituents and make it known.  Good job Congressman.
